original_solution_mapping.L1: The ants will need 800 ounces of food because 400 x 2 = <<400*2=800>>800
original_solution_mapping.L2: The ant food will cost $80 because 800 x .1 = <<800*.1=80>>80
original_solution_mapping.L3: He has earned $60 from the leaves he has raked because 6000 leaves * $0.01/leaf = $<<6000*0.01=60>>60
original_solution_mapping.L4: He earned $20 from all his jobs because 80 - 60 = <<80-60=20>>20

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7420.
    Returns: the number of jobs Nikola completed.
    """
    # L1
    num_ants = 400 # 400 ants in his farm
    ounces_per_ant = 2 # Each ant needs 2 ounces of food
    total_ounces_food = num_ants * ounces_per_ant

    # L2
    cost_per_ounce = 0.1 # Every ounce of ant food costs $.1
    total_food_cost = total_ounces_food * cost_per_ounce

    # L3
    num_leaves_raked = 6000 # raked 6,000 leaves
    cost_per_leaf = 0.01 # Each leaf he rakes costs 1 penny
    earnings_from_leaves = num_leaves_raked * cost_per_leaf

    # L4
    earnings_from_jobs_only = total_food_cost - earnings_from_leaves

    # L5
    job_start_fee = 5 # charges $5 to start a job
    num_jobs_completed = earnings_from_jobs_only / job_start_fee

    # FA
    answer = num_jobs_completed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The ants will need {total_ounces_food} ounces of food because {num_ants} x {ounces_per_ant} = <<{num_ants}*{ounces_per_ant}={total_ounces_food}>>{total_ounces_food}
The ant food will cost ${total_food_cost} because {total_ounces_food} x {cost_per_ounce} = <<{total_ounces_food}*{cost_per_ounce}={total_food_cost}>>{total_food_cost}

He has earned ${earnings_from_leaves} from the leaves he has raked because {num_leaves_raked} leaves * ${cost_per_leaf}/leaf = $<<{num_leaves_raked}*{cost_per_leaf}={earnings_from_leaves}>>{earnings_from_leaves}

He earned ${earnings_from_jobs_only} from all his jobs because {total_food_cost} - {earnings_from_leaves} = <<{total_food_cost}-{earnings_from_leaves}={earnings_from_jobs_only}>>{earnings_from_jobs_only}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The ants will need 160000 ounces of food because 400 x 400 = <<400*400=160000>>160000
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: He has earned $60 from the leaves he has raked because 6000 leaves * $0.01/leaf = $<<6000*0.01=60>>60
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: He earned $15940 from all his jobs because 16000 - 60 = <<16000-60=15940>>15940

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'num_ants' (400) was used instead of 'ounces_per_ant' (2).
